Expression.Name: Payment LCR US
Expression.Description: Low cost routing to US provider (e.g. Authorize.Net) for credit cards for accounts in the US, where the payment is in US$ and the amount is < $100
Expression.Content: payment.Amount < 100 && payment.Currency == USD && payment.Payer.Country == US && payment.PaymentInstrument.CreditCardType != “Discover”
